quest.name: All Due Precautions
journal: Professor Lamberteint is eager to tell you anything and everything of corrupted crystals.

* This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Lamberteint in Camp Drybone.

※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.

In yet another curious twist of fate, you come upon a merchant forcing passersby to accept his old pots free of charge. Conceal your delight lest he changes his mind and deliver the pot to Professor Lamberteint.
The “unremarkable piece of rubbish,” so dubbed by the good professor, will suffice for your purposes. Now, watch and be amazed as he uses science to transform the pot into something far greater.

dialogue.name: LAMBERTEINT
dialogue.text: Ahhh, so rare it is to find fellow intellectuals in this region. 'Tis even rarer to find one capable of comprehending the nature of corrupted crystals.

dialogue.name: LAMBERTEINT
dialogue.text: Come to think of it, there was another─a hermit to whom the church had given sanctuary. Curious fellow. Unsociable, rather daft at first impression, yet possessed of an amazing affinity towards the scientific pursuits...

dialogue.name: LAMBERTEINT
dialogue.text: But to the matter at hand─did you say you wish not to conduct field observations, but to harvest a corrupted crystal?

dialogue.name: LAMBERTEINT
dialogue.text: Egads, womanman! At least take the necessary precautions so that you do not suffer from exposure to its harmful energies! I'm beginning to wonder if you've sufficient qualifications to handle such hazardous materials...

dialogue.name: LAMBERTEINT
dialogue.text: Still, your ignorance is somehow endearing. If you bring me a suitable vessel─say, a common clay pot─I shall coat it with an alchemical sealant of mine own design. Simply store the crystal you seek within this pot to protect yourself from its deleterious effects.

dialogue.name: LAMBERTEINT
dialogue.text: Hm? Where might you find a clay pot? Well, I'm hardly a merchant, but surely some fellow at the Golden Bazaar has some for sale.

dialogue.name: ENPC
dialogue.text: You get a pot! And you get a pot! Everyone gets a pot! Ahem, sorry─I get a bit carried away when disposing of old merchandise. Anyroad, take my pot, please.

dialogue.name: ENPC
dialogue.text: If this is about the pot, bugger off. I'm not taking it back.

dialogue.name: LAMBERTEINT
dialogue.text: Fascinating...even accounting for the unusually strong aetherial currents in this region, the crystalline formations are─ Oh, you've returned! Any luck finding a pot like I suggested?

dialogue.name: LAMBERTEINT
dialogue.text: Well, this is indeed an unremarkable piece of rubbish! But for our purposes, it shall suffice.

obj.n: Into the Eye of the Storm
